ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Magazine Looking to Interview Players
ygData.msgSnippet: There is a growing body of research on Internet usage and specifically on on-line game playing. I believe the leading concensus at this time is that addiction
ygData.messageBody:
There is a growing body of research on Internet usage and specifically
on on-line game playing. I believe the leading concensus at this time
is that addiction is not the appropriate term for excessive Internet
use because excessive Internet use does not meet the accepted criteria
for addiction.

I wish you luck on your article.

--- nrothbaum <nrothbaum@...> wrote:
> I am writing a story about adult video game playing for a national
> magazine. I would like to talk to some addicted EverQuest
> players. If you would like to be included in the story please e-mail
> me (at nrothbaum@...) as soon as possible, since I am
> working on a very tight deadline.
>
> Thank you for all your help,
>
> -Noah Rothbaum
>
>
>
